verses.verse: Of the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> finely <S%H8278>worked<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6213>place,<s%> and made the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

They <S%H7554>beat<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H854>into<s%> thin <S%H6341>plates,<s%> and <S%H7112>cut<s%> it into <S%H6616>wires,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> it in the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> in the <S%H713>purple,<s%> in the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and in the fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the skillful <S%H2803>workman.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps for <S%H2266>it,<s%> joined together. At the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> it was joined <S%H2266>together.<s%>

The skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> that was on <S%H642>it,<s%> with which to fasten it <S%H4639>on,<s%> was of the same piece, like its work; of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

They <S%H6213>worked<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H4142>enclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H6605>engraved<s%> with the <S%H6605>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> to be <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H4639>workman,<s%> like the work of the <S%H646>ephod;<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

It was <S%H7251>square.<s%> They <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H3717>double.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was a <S%H2239>span,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H2239>span,<s%> being <S%H3717>double.<s%>

They <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones.<s%> A <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H124>ruby,<s%> <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and <S%H1304>beryl<s%> was the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row;<s%>
and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H3095>turquoise,<s%> a <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> and an <S%H5306>emerald;<s%>
and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H3958>jacinth,<s%> an <S%H7618>agate,<s%> and an <S%H306>amethyst;<s%>

and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H8658>chrysolite,<s%> an <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and a <S%H3471>jasper.<s%> They were <S%H4142>enclosed<s%> <S%H4865>in<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4865>settings.<s%>

The <S%H68>stones<s%> were according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve,<s%> according to their <S%H8034>names;<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> according to his <S%H8034>name,<s%> for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> on the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> like <S%H1383>cords,<s%> of <S%H5688>braided<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
They <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> braided <S%H5688>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> at the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

The other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>braided<s%> <S%H5688>chains<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>settings,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> in <S%H4136>its<s%> <S%H6440>front.<s%>

They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> on its <S%H8193>edge,<s%> which was toward the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4295>underneath,<s%> <S%H4136>in<s%> its <S%H6440>front,<s%> <S%H5980>close<s%> by its <S%H4225>coupling,<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

They <S%H7405>bound<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by its <S%H2885>rings<s%> to the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> that it might be on the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> might not come <S%H2118>loose<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue.<s%>

The <S%H6310>opening<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst<s%> was like the <S%H6310>opening<s%> of a <S%H8473>coat<s%> of <S%H8193>mail,<s%> with a binding <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H6310>opening,<s%> that it should not be <S%H7167>torn.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> on the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and twined <S%H7806>linen.<s%>

They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6472>bells<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%>

a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H7757>skirts<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H3068>in,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3801>coats<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and for his <S%H1121>sons,<s%>

and the <S%H4701>turban<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and the <S%H8336>linen<s%> <S%H4021>headbands<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and the <S%H8336>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%>

and the <S%H73>sash<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

They <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6731>plate<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on it a <S%H4385>writing,<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet:<s%> <S%H6944>"HOLY<s%> TO <S%H3068>YAHWEH.<s%>"

They <S%H5414>tied<s%> to it a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> to <S%H5414>fasten<s%> it on the <S%H4701>turban<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus all the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> was <S%H3615>finished.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> so they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H4908>tent,<s%> with all its <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> its <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%>

the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides,<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen,<s%>
the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> with its <S%H905>poles,<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%>
the <S%H7979>table,<s%> all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the show <S%H6440>bread,<s%>

the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> even the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to be set in <S%H4634>order,<s%> all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%>

the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%>
the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> its <S%H4345>grating<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> its <S%H905>poles,<s%> all of its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>base,<s%>

the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H4340>cords,<s%> its <S%H3489>pins,<s%> all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> for the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%>

the finely <S%H8278>worked<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place,<s%> the holy <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.
According to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H5656>work.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3651>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> and <S%H6213>behold,<s%> they had done it as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> even so had they <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H4872>it:<s%> and Moses blessed <S%H1288>them.<s%>
